name: Ninetales
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

poke_power.name: Color Shift
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. Ninetales is the same type as that Pokémon (all if that Pokémon is more than 1 type) until the end of your turn. This power can’t be used if Ninetales is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a {R} Energy attached to Ninetales.
